amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-187 to require states to coordinate the subsidized employment program authorized in the bill with other federal workforce development programs, including the Federal Work Study Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
